comments.comments_text: Goal! Jacob Murphy (Newcastle Utd) fires the rebound into the top right corner after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Fabian Schar sends a precise cross into the box, Joelinton (Newcastle Utd) latches on to it and puts the ball into the bottom right corner. He makes it 2:0.

comments.comments_text: Jacob Murphy (Newcastle Utd) quickly gets to a rebound. He is not worried how far out he is and slams the ball towards the goal. To the amazement of all, it goes all the way into the bottom left corner. He makes it 3:0 with this magnificent strike.
